articles.title: Candidates make final pitches ahead of the midterms
articles.description: With just one day to go until the midterm elections, candidates up and down the ballot are making their final campaign pushes. CBSN political contributor Sabrina Siddiqui joins CBSN to break down the final messaging.

articles.title: Trump on final campaign blitz before midterm elections
articles.description: President Trump left Washington for three rallies ahead of Tuesday's midterm elections. The final push follows an intense weekend of campaigning, and intensifying rhetoric on immigration. CBS News White House correspondent Weijia Jiang reports.
